description: There's a new video website that wants you to stop watching cat videos and start paying attention to things that matter. For example, who actually works for minimum wage? If that stuff sounds like homework, you'd be surprised at how good Upworthy is getting at making the videos they find go viral. And the Johannesburg Zoo has a new social media editor -- a honey badger.

title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, July 5, 2013
